SELECT
FROM we_operations_center_sop_scope WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT wocss.id, wocss.target_id, IF( wu.user_name IS NULL, wg.group_name, wu.user_name) userName, '' departmentName, wocss.type FROM we_operations_center_sop_scope wocss LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wocss.corp_id = wu.corp_id AND wocss.target_id = wu.user_id LEFT JOIN we_group wg ON wocss.corp_id = wg.corp_id AND wocss.target_id = wg.chat_id WHERE wocss.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wocss.sop_id = #{sopId} AND wocss.type = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@SOP_USE_EMPLOYEE} UNION SELECT wocss.id, wocss.target_id, '' userName, IF( wd.name IS NULL, '', wd.name) departmentName, wocss.type FROM we_operations_center_sop_scope wocss LEFT JOIN we_department wd ON wocss.target_id = wd.id AND wd.corp_id = wocss.corp_id WHERE wocss.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wocss.sop_id = #{sopId} AND wocss.type = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@SOP_USE_DEPARTMENT}
